Advanced XML Banner Rotator AS2
Supports tile and subtitle or any other kind of description with html formatting - size, color, bold etc.

Rotator supports .SWF animated files as well
As you can see in this example animated flash files are supported and the blur effect is maintained for a very cool look. You can also notice the description can be any size, the graphics will just adjust.

Mouseover pausing feature
When the mouse is over the rotator, it will pause auto-play as shown by the icon on the top left corner

This is a html colored title set in the xml
You can also use bold, underline or any other color or size, you have total control.

Supports independent autoplay timer for each item
This way you can control how much you can keep each item on screen depending on it's importance.

Control the target from XML as well
Each link can be opened in a different target, for example _self or _blank, it's always your call.

Full control over blur effects and animations in XML
Customize the size, effects and the animation time and type in just seconds.

Virtually unlimited items supported
However just make sure the buttons fit inside the display area so it looks neat.
